exercise.title: Parameters and Return Value

p.i: The same function can accept input parameters and return a value.

exercise.p: Assign an onclick event to the 'ROLL THE DICE' button so that the function rollTheDice() is called when the button is clicked.

The function rollTheDice() should do the following:
Call the function randomInteger(from, to) with parameter values 1 and 6.
Assign the return value of the function to the variable diceValue.(noppa)
Insert the value of the variable diceValue into the HTML div element whose id is 'dice'.
HINT: As you define the function randomInteger(from, to), use Math.floor() function to round a random float number downward to its nearest integer.
Test your code. Each time you click the button you should see a random value between 1 and 6 below the button.
Submit a link to your code (myy etc).
